dcterms:creator: Carina Silberer
Vittorio Ferrari
Mirella Lapata
dcterms:description: The Visual Attributes for Concepts Dataset (ViSA) contains per-concept (as opposed to per-image) attributes for 500 concrete concepts (CAT, SOFA, MILK) spanning across different categories (MAMMALS, FURNITURE), annotated with 636 general attributes.
dcterms:title: Visual Attributes for Concepts Dataset (ViSA)

dcterms:creator: Sahar Kazemzadeh
Vicente Ordonez
Mark Matten
Tamara L Berg
dcterms:description: The ReferIT dataset consists of referring expressions (REs) denoting objects (delimited by bounding boxes) in natural images, filtered to ensure that the referent and context do not overlap.
dcterms:title: ReferIT

dcterms:description: The Discriminative Attribute Dataset is generated by the authors for their experiments, consisting of pairs of intended referents and contexts, with respect to which the referents should be identified by their distinctive attributes.
dcterms:title: Discriminative Attribute Dataset
